import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import ApiKeyConfig from'./components/ApiKeyConfig';import ChatInterface from'./components/ChatInterface';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[credentials,setCredentials]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{// Ê£ÄÊü•Êú¨Âú∞Â≠òÂÇ®‰∏≠ÊòØÂê¶Êúâ‰øùÂ≠òÁöÑAPIÂØÜÈí•
const savedApiKey=localStorage.getItem('apiKey');const savedAppId=localStorage.getItem('appId');if(savedApiKey&&savedAppId){// È™åËØÅ‰øùÂ≠òÁöÑÂØÜÈí•ÊòØÂê¶‰ªçÁÑ∂ÊúâÊïà
validateCredentials(savedApiKey,savedAppId);}else{setIsLoading(false);}},[]);const validateCredentials=async(apiKey,appId)=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/validate-api-key',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({api_key:apiKey,app_id:appId})});const data=await response.json();if(data.success){setCredentials({apiKey,appId});localStorage.setItem('apiKey',apiKey);localStorage.setItem('appId',appId);}else{// Ê∏ÖÈô§Êó†ÊïàÁöÑÂØÜÈí•
localStorage.removeItem('apiKey');localStorage.removeItem('appId');}}catch(error){console.error('È™åËØÅAPIÂØÜÈí•Â§±Ë¥•:',error);// Ê∏ÖÈô§Êó†ÊïàÁöÑÂØÜÈí•
localStorage.removeItem('apiKey');localStorage.removeItem('appId');}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleConfigSuccess=(apiKey,appId)=>{setCredentials({apiKey,appId});localStorage.setItem('apiKey',apiKey);localStorage.setItem('appId',appId);};const handleLogout=()=>{setCredentials(null);localStorage.removeItem('apiKey');localStorage.removeItem('appId');};if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-loading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-spinner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u6B63\u5728\u9A8C\u8BC1API\u5BC6\u94A5..."})]})});}if(!credentials){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApiKeyConfig,{onConfigSuccess:handleConfigSuccess});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83E\uDD16 \u6CD5\u5F8B\u77E5\u8BC6\u52A9\u624B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"logout-button",children:"\uD83D\uDD04 \u91CD\u65B0\u914D\u7F6E"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatInterface,{apiKey:credentials.apiKey,appId:credentials.appId})]});};export default App;
